caption: This was one of the best escape room experiences I've had in France. Guillaume was a lovely host and made sure our English speaking group had tons of fun. 10/10 would recommend.
Amazing game! Would definitely recommend. Level medium-hard. Big thank you for Juliette and Cl√©mence for making this super fun!!
It was an amazing experience! Juliette encouraged us and gave us a real life perspective on the Pirate Life!  Will do this again!

We did two escape rooms in one evening. First we did the pirate ship treasure hunt and after we had to solve the mystery around James Murdoch. Juliette made it super easy for us to emerge into the roles and was AT LEAST as enthusiastic as we were on the missions. The rooms are well worked and the riddles are challenging, but not impossible tasks. We can only recommend both venues and the treatment is amazing! We even got a lot of feedback that is going to help us a lot for our upcoming escape rooms booked on this visit over the weekend.  Thanks again to the venue and our game master.
amazing experience honestly would recommended, Victors great acting skills and Dio for being an amazing host. 10/10 experience!

We did the puzzle about the Detective Murdoch  and it was a lot of fun! The room is designed well for both ambiance and puzzles and it felt like we were really in a detective's office. A big thank you to Juliette who was able to provide hints along the way that weren't too obvious but helped us stay on the right track without getting too frustrated.
It was amazing! Mathilde helped us a lot and she was nice! It was fun!

Well worth the experience! I'm not an escape-room adept so I found the puzzles particularly challenging, which made for some fun moments with the team. Many thanks to GM Edith for helping us successfully navigate to the treasure!
It was amazing we had so much fun Juliette is really helpful and nice ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
We went for the submarine with Juliette as advisor, in English! Excellent experience and helpful clues, at the right timing. We enjoyed it very much. Well balanced and good rhythm.

Super fun experience! Went with friends and had a blast! Friendly staff, Richard was so helpful and he gave hints when it‚Äôs needed but at perfect timing to make sure we would still enjoy the experience to explore and try out different options. Would try other themes at Hinthunt as well~ would recommend everyone to go for a group activity!!! =]
Absolutely EXCELLENT ! The pirate experience is the best room I have played to this day. The riddles are really cool, and the setting is totally amazing ! Sooo immersive ! üòç ‚Ä¶

Great escape game! We went there with a large group, it was easy to book multiple rooms and to ask the staff for some rooms to be in English and others in French. The rooms themselves are fun and immersive.
I do wish they had options to meet other people and work with them in groups. In America you can be grouped with strangers which is really fun to work with other people. Overall great experience;)
Melissandre was a very good host and her English was perfect. We did the pirate hint hunt and it was great
Subtle and smooth experience. A little run down, but it just adds to the flavour. We did the Zen room and thoroughly enjoyed.
Hint Hunt are among the Masters of escape rooms in Paris. The enigma are challenging and the rooms decorations stunning. A must do!
A very nice experience. We did the zen room; it's bright and looks minimalistic.
We made it out with 15 seconds. It's perfectly designed to be not too hard, get not to easy.
Great escape game with immersive rooms !

Really nice place. Good for team building and with friends
Too much red herring, was pleasent as an experience might be a bit overpriced

Excellent experience and absolutely lovely staff

A real challenge and lots of fun! Worth the visit
